view-template.post_title: Loop item in Sites File Data View

view-template.post_content:
[types field='details' item='$current_page'][/types]

Scan Locations

[types field='scan-locations' title='%%TITLE%%' alt='%%ALT%%' size='full' item='$current_page' class='img-responsive'][/types]

view-template.post_content:
[wpv-conditional if="( $(wpcf-display) eq '0' )"]
[wpv-map-render map_id="map" map_height="400px"][/wpv-map-render] [wpv-map-marker map_id='map' marker_id='marker' marker_field='wpcf-map-location' item='$current_page'][/wpv-map-marker]
[/wpv-conditional] [wpv-conditional if="( $(wpcf-display) eq '1' )"]

[/wpv-conditional] [wpv-conditional if="( $(wpcf-display) eq '4' )"]
[/wpv-conditional]
